## Readings & Reference Material

- **RDS**, chs 
- Tidyverse cheatsheets: <https://rstudio.github.io/cheatsheets/>, especially:
    - data tidying with tidyr: [html](https://rstudio.github.io/cheatsheets/html/tidyr.html) and [pdf](https://rstudio.github.io/cheatsheets/tidyr.pdf)
    - data transformation with dplyr: [html](https://rstudio.github.io/cheatsheets/html/data-transformation.html) and [pdf](https://rstudio.github.io/cheatsheets/data-transformation.pdf)
    - data import with readr: [html](https://rstudio.github.io/cheatsheets/html/data-import.html) and [pdf](https://rstudio.github.io/cheatsheets/data-import.pdf)
    - data visualization with ggplot2: [html](https://rstudio.github.io/cheatsheets/html/data-visualization.html) and [pdf](https://rstudio.github.io/cheatsheets/data-visualization.pdf)

## Computer Work

In case you have not yet done so, install the `tidyverse' series of packages in your local R installation.
